price: “Allah odur ki, ondan başka (hak) ilâh yoktur. Azîm olan Arş’ın Rabbidir.”
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
